title: font issue; mobile
description: A short description of the post.
contents:
Contents distorted on mobile: ggtext + ggiraph font sepecified + no theme > distorted on mobile and desktop: ggtext + ggiraph + NO font specified > distorted on mobile and desktop: ggtext + ggiraph + NO font specified+ svglite > distorted mobile & desktop: ggtext + ggiraph +Arial > not distorted: ggiraph + Roboto condensed (no ggtext) library(tidyverse) library(ggtext) library(ggiraph) library(extrafont) extrafont::loadfonts(quiet=T) library(hrbrthemes) library(svglite) distorted on mobile: ggtext + ggiraph font sepecified + no theme my_plot <- mtcars %>% ggplot()+ labs(title=glue::glue("this is a very long title, with many lines and a line
break etc etc etc, this
word is in red or something else etc etc"))+ geom_point_interactive(aes(x=wt, y=qsec, tooltip=paste(wt, qsec)))+ # theme_minimal()+ theme(plot.title=element_markdown(), text=element_text(family="Roboto Condensed")) girafe(ggobj = my_plot, fonts=list(sans="Roboto Condensed"), height_svg = 5, options = list( opts_toolbar(saveaspng = FALSE)) ) {"x":{"html":" ","js":null,"uid":"svg_fa8328e7-fd24-464c-9e5d-672fc063105c","ratio":1.2,"settings":{"tooltip":{"css":".tooltip_SVGID_ { padding:5px;background:black;color:white;border-radius:2px 2px 2px 2px ; position:absolute;pointer-events:none;z-index:999;} ","offx":10,"offy":0,"use_cursor_pos":true,"opacity":0.9,"usefill":false,"usestroke":false,"delay":{"over":200,"out":500}},"hover":{"css":".hover_SVGID_ { fill:orange;stroke:gray; } ","reactive":false},"hoverkey":{"css":".hover_key_SVGID_ { stroke:red; } ","reactive":false},"hovertheme":{"css":".hover_theme_SVGID_ { fill:green; } ","reactive":false},"hoverinv":{"css":""},"zoom":{"min":1,"max":1},"capture":{"css":".selected_SVGID_ { fill:red;stroke:gray; } ","type":"multiple","only_shiny":true,"selected":[]},"capturekey":{"css":".selected_key_SVGID_ { stroke:gray; } ","type":"single","only_shiny":true,"selected":[]},"capturetheme":{"css":".selected_theme_SVGID_ { stroke:gray; } ","type":"single","only_shiny":true,"selected":[]},"toolbar":{"position":"topright","saveaspng":false,"pngname":"diagram"},"sizing":{"rescale":true,"width":1}}},"evals":[],"jsHooks":[]} > distorted on mobile and desktop: ggtext + ggiraph + NO font specified my_plot2 <- mtcars %>% ggplot()+ labs(title=glue::glue("this is a very long title, with many lines and a line
break etc etc etc, this

title: Welcome to distill test drive
description:
Welcome to our new blog, distill test drive. We hope you enjoy 
reading what we have to say!
